Subject: Re: Event Contract 11/24/2024

Hi Dina,

Thanks for confirming your drink preference! We've noted that you'll be letting your staff order drinks directly.  

We've also received your deposit and ID.  Your event on November 24th is now officially confirmed! You'll receive a formal event invitation shortly with all the finalized details.

Please let us know if you have any other questions.

Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
